title: That Girl At The Party
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I've had a week from hell, I don't know how it started
Like a rollercoaster that never seems to end
Like a rain cloud above my shoulders
Oh, it feels like the weight is pouring down
[Pre-Chorus]
Can anybody hear me, hear me, hear me now?
Can anybody see the path life chose somehow?
Can somebody just hold me in their arms tonight?
'Cause I don't wanna be, I don't wanna be
[Chorus]
That girl at the party drinking alone
That girl at the party who just won't go home
Chasing boys, chasing dreams, so frustrated by reality
I don't wanna be, I don't wanna be that girl at the party
[Verse 2]
I try my best, but I just can't get permission
Never could enough 'cause there's never a room for two
And sometimes my tears feel like a waterfall
But I guess to you, they don't mean a thing at all
[Pre-Chorus]
Can anybody hear me, hear me, hear me now?
Can anybody see the path life chose somehow?
Can somebody just hold me in their arms tonight?
'Cause I don't wanna be, I don't wanna be

[Chorus]
That girl at the party drinking alone
That girl at the party who just won't go home
Chasing boys, chasing dreams, so frustrated by reality
I don't wanna be, I don't wanna be
[Bridge]
Oh, room spinning
I don't feel ain't no place for me
I don't wanna be
No, I don't wanna be
[Chorus]
That girl at the party drinking alone
That girl at the party who just won't go home
Chasing boys, chasing dreams, so frustrated by reality
I don't wanna be, I don't wanna be
That girl at the party drinking alone
That girl at the party who just won't go home
Chasing boys, chasing dreams, so frustrated by reality
I don't wanna be, I don't wanna be that girl at the party
